transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens to a given address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one address to another, given the spender's allowance.

approve.description: Approves a spender to withdraw from the caller's account, up to the specified value.

increaseApproval.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

decreaseApproval.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of the specified address.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to the specified address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

pause.description: Pauses the contract, preventing all token transfers and minting.

unpause.description: Unpauses the contract, resuming normal operations.

reclaimToken.description: Reclaims any ERC20 tokens that were sent to the contract by mistake.

finishMinting.description: Ends the minting process, preventing any further minting.

claimOwnership.description: Claims ownership of the contract after a transfer.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

pendingOwner.description: Returns the address of the pending owner.

mintingFinished.description: Returns whether the minting process has been finished.

paused.description: Returns whether the contract is currently paused.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of an owner.

Pause.description: Emitted when the contract is paused.

Unpause.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused.

Mint.description: Emitted when new tokens are minted.

MintFinished.description: Emitted when minting has been finished.

OwnershipRenounced.description: Emitted when ownership of the contract is renounced.

OwnershipTransferred.description: Emitted when ownership of the contract is transferred.

Approval.description: Emitted when a spender's allowance is approved.
